title: Does a umrah counts for the child in the mother's womb when she performs umrah
transcript: philosopher is asking about his wife who's pregnant and wants to make home rock does the child also is included in their homeland answer's no because this child is not born yet but if he had a child that is a year or two or more of age and he wants this child to perform Umrah alongside with him then he would have reward inshallah and also the parents would be rewarded for that
